attributes.action: To increase the help to buy scheme limit for other parts of UK as well.
attributes.background:
Currently, help to buy scheme for London region is  £600,000.
If you see the new property prices in other regions are way beyond Help to buy cap limit. 
Please review the help to buy cap limit for the other regions of UK and request to increase the help to buy price limit.

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about the price limit under the Help to Buy ISA scheme. However it's not clear what you want the limit to be increased to, or by how much. 

You might like to sign this petition which calls for a very similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597248
